```{r test-2}
library(fpc)
set.seed(665544)
n <- 600
x <- cbind(runif(10, 0, 10)+rnorm(n, sd=0.2), runif(10, 0, 10)+rnorm(n,
  sd=0.2))
par(bg="grey40")
ds <- dbscan(x, eps=0.2,MinPts = 10,
            method = "raw")
# run with showplot=1 to see how dbscan works.
ds
plot(ds, x)
```
